languages.text: "Помилуйте! Никаких махинаций, все строго по документам. У нас есть более приоритетные статьи расходов, потому сироты обеспечены лишь самым необходимым". {n}Янрис тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Они одеты и не голодают, но отчего-то доводы разума меня не утешают. Личные вещи, подарки по особым случаям, протеиновые брикеты для растущих организмов — это определенно осчастливило бы сироток".

"Please! No scheming. Everything is duly accounted for. We have higher-priority expenditure items, which is why the orphans only get the bare necessities." {n}Janris sighs heavily.{/n} "They are clothed and aren't starving, but for some reason I find scant comfort in rational arguments. Personal items, gifts on special occasions, or nutribars for their growing bodies would certainly make the little orphans happier."
languages.original_text: "Помилуйте! Никаких махинаций, все строго по документам. У нас есть более приоритетные статьи расходов, потому сироты обеспечены лишь самым необходимым". {n}Янрис тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Они одеты и не голодают, но отчего-то доводы разума меня не утешают. Личные вещи, подарки по особым случаям, протеиновые брикеты для растущих организмов — это определенно осчастливило бы сироток".

traits.locale_text: "Please! No schemes. Everything duly accounted for. We have higher-priority items of expenditure, which is why the orphans only get the bare necessities." {n}Janris sighs heavily.{/n} "They are clothed and aren't starving, but for some reason I find scant comfort in rational arguments. Personal items, gifts on special occasions, protein bars for their growing bodies are all things that would definitely make the little orphans happier."

languages.text: « Je vous en supplie ! Il n'est pas question de détourner quoi que ce soit. Les comptes sont tout à fait exacts. Nous avons des postes de dépense autrement plus importants, d'où le fait que les orphelins doivent se contenter du strict nécessaire. » {n}Janris pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Mais j'avoue ne trouver que peu de réconfort à savoir qu'ils ont des vêtements sur le dos et ne meurent pas de faim. Quelques objets personnels, des cadeaux pour les grandes occasions ou même des nutribarres pour leur apporter les nutriments nécessaires à leur croissance leur mettraient certainement un peu de baume au cœur. »
languages.original_text: "Please! No scheming. Everything is duly accounted for. We have higher-priority expenditure items, which is why the orphans only get the bare necessities." {n}Janris sighs heavily.{/n} "They are clothed and aren't starving, but for some reason I find scant comfort in rational arguments. Personal items, gifts on special occasions, or nutribars for their growing bodies would certainly make the little orphans happier."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous en supplie ! Il n'est pas question de détourner quoi que ce soit. Les comptes sont tout à fait exacts. Nous avons des postes de dépense autrement plus importants, d'où le fait que les orphelins doivent se contenter du strict nécessaire. » {n}Janris pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Mais j'avoue ne trouver que peu de réconfort à savoir qu'ils ont des vêtements sur le dos et ne meurent pas de faim. Quelques objets personnels, des cadeaux pour les grandes occasions ou même des nutribarres pour leur apporter les nutriments nécessaires à leur croissance leur mettraient certainement un peu de baume au cœur. »

languages.text: «¡Por favor! Nada de eso. Todo es perfectamente legal. Tenemos gastos prioritarios, y ese es el motivo por el que los huérfanos solo reciben lo estrictamente necesario». {n}Janris suspira con pesadez.{/n} «Tienen ropa y no pasan hambre, pero, curiosamente, esos argumentos lógicos no me proporcionan ningún consuelo. Algunos objetos personales, regalos en ocasiones especiales y barritas de nutrientes para su desarrollo físico les darían una alegría a los huerfanitos».
languages.original_text: "Please! No scheming. Everything is duly accounted for. We have higher-priority expenditure items, which is why the orphans only get the bare necessities." {n}Janris sighs heavily.{/n} "They are clothed and aren't starving, but for some reason I find scant comfort in rational arguments. Personal items, gifts on special occasions, or nutribars for their growing bodies would certainly make the little orphans happier."

traits.locale_text: «¡Por favor! Nada de eso. Todo es perfectamente legal. Tenemos gastos prioritarios, y ese es el motivo por el que los huérfanos solo reciben lo estrictamente necesario». {n}Janris suspira con pesadez.{/n} «Tienen ropa y no pasan hambre, pero, curiosamente, esos argumentos lógicos no me proporcionan ningún consuelo. Algunos objetos personales, regalos en ocasiones especiales y barritas de nutrientes para su desarrollo físico les darían una alegría a los huerfanitos».

languages.text: “拜托，大人！我完全没有这方面的打算，我们的每笔支出都清清楚楚。我明白还有更重要的事情要做，因此我们只为那些孤儿提供最基本的必需品。”{n}詹里斯深深地叹了口气。{/n}“他们有饭吃，有衣穿，但不知为何，这种合理的安排并不足以让我感到欣慰。如果能给他们一些私人的小玩意儿，或是在某些场合下特别的礼物，或是能帮助他们茁壮成长的营养条，这肯定会让那些失去父母的小家伙们更开心。”
languages.original_text: "Please! No scheming. Everything is duly accounted for. We have higher-priority expenditure items, which is why the orphans only get the bare necessities." {n}Janris sighs heavily.{/n} "They are clothed and aren't starving, but for some reason I find scant comfort in rational arguments. Personal items, gifts on special occasions, or nutribars for their growing bodies would certainly make the little orphans happier."

traits.locale_text: “拜托，大人！我完全没有这方面的打算，我们的每笔支出都清清楚楚。我明白还有更重要的事情要做，因此我们只为那些孤儿提供最基本的必需品。”{n}詹里斯深深地叹了口气。{/n}“他们有饭吃，有衣穿，但不知为何，这种合理的安排并不足以让我感到欣慰。如果能给他们一些私人的小玩意儿，或是在某些场合下特别的礼物，或是能帮助他们茁壮成长的营养条，这肯定会让那些失去父母的小家伙们更开心。”

languages.text: 「ご勘弁を。そのような悪巧みはしておりません。すべてきちんと説明します。私たちには優先しなければいけない事があり、孤児たちには必要最低限しか与えていないのです。{n}ジャンリスは重いため息をついた。{/n}「着る物もあれば、食事も与えられている。 ですが、身の回りの物や特別な日の贈り物、成長期の子供たちに栄養バーなどがあれば、孤児たちはもっと幸せになれるでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "Please! No scheming. Everything is duly accounted for. We have higher-priority expenditure items, which is why the orphans only get the bare necessities." {n}Janris sighs heavily.{/n} "They are clothed and aren't starving, but for some reason I find scant comfort in rational arguments. Personal items, gifts on special occasions, or nutribars for their growing bodies would certainly make the little orphans happier."

traits.locale_text: 「お願いします！策略はしないでください。すべてきちんと説明します。私たちには優先しなければいけない事があり、孤児たちには必要最低限しか与えていないのです。{n}ジャンリスは重いため息をついた。{/n}「彼らは衣類を着ているし、食事も与えられている。 ですが、個人的な所有物や特別な日の贈り物、成長期の栄養補助食品などがあれば、小さな孤児たちをもっと幸せにするでしょうね」

languages.text: "Bitte! Nichts dergleichen. Alle Ausgaben sind bestens belegt, die Bücher sind einwandfrei. Wir haben wichtigere Ausgaben, daher bekommen die Waisen nur das Allernötigste." {n}Janris seufzt schwer.{/n} "Sie haben Kleidung und verhungern nicht, doch rationale Argumente spenden mir kaum Trost, warum auch immer. Persönliche Gegenstände, Geschenke zu besonderen Gelegenheiten oder Nutririegel für ihre noch im Wachstum befindlichen Körper, all das würde die kleinen Waisen glücklicher machen."
languages.original_text: "Please! No scheming. Everything is duly accounted for. We have higher-priority expenditure items, which is why the orphans only get the bare necessities." {n}Janris sighs heavily.{/n} "They are clothed and aren't starving, but for some reason I find scant comfort in rational arguments. Personal items, gifts on special occasions, or nutribars for their growing bodies would certainly make the little orphans happier."

Persönliche Gegenstände, Geschenke zu besonderen Gelegenheiten oder Nutririegel für ihre noch im Wachstum befindlichen Körper, all das würde die kleinen Waisen glücklicher machen."

languages.text: "Teessüf ederim! Öyle planlarım yok. Her şeyin layıkıyla kaydı tutuluyor. Masraflı yüksek öncelikli unsurlarımız mevcut. Bu nedenle yetimlerin yalnızca asgari gereksinimleri karşılanıyor." {n}Janris, derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Kıyafetleri eksik değil, karınları aç değil. Ancak nedendir bilmiyorum, bu tür akla yatan hususlar bana pek huzur vermiyor. Şahsi eşyalar, özel günlerde hediyeler ya da gelişen bedenleri için besinbarlar, muhakkak ki minik yetimlerimizi daha mutlu kılacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Please! No scheming. Everything is duly accounted for. We have higher-priority expenditure items, which is why the orphans only get the bare necessities." {n}Janris sighs heavily.{/n} "They are clothed and aren't starving, but for some reason I find scant comfort in rational arguments. Personal items, gifts on special occasions, or nutribars for their growing bodies would certainly make the little orphans happier."
